message: Better support for integrating the CSE into other applications
Improved explanation how to integrate into other applications
Introduced background worker class for all background tasks
Fixed wrong originator for already registered AE. Added appData API for Apps.
Fixed Configuration & MultiThread is now default. Added __init__.py files.
Improved documentation for release. Bump version number
Moved backlog to a separate file
Added warnings when an imported <CSEBase> overwrites any of the *csi*, *ri*, *rn* attributes. Better error handling for ill-formed CSE-ID.
Changed running the cse. Now, the acme module is run instead of a separate starter script
Added [cse.console].confirmQuit configuration option. It is switched off by default.
Added Massimo Vanetti to the acknowledgements
Repaired wrapping for CSE-based notification (like for subscriptions)
Improved documentation. Moved quick configuration to "installation"
Removed acpi attribute definition from <contentInstance> resource. Added more tests for inheriting ACPs.
Updated documentation for scripting and first setup
Documentation & preparation for the next release
Added support for BLOCKING UPDATE notification event type.
Added to thank you section. Prepare for release
Moved console documentation to a separate file. Explained function keys
Fixed target originator for notifications sent via MQTT.
Changed social button from Twitter to Mastodon
Moved scripting to a lisp-based language
Fixed a crash when checking permissions and the ACP has a `acod.ty` attribute set. See #112
